title: Executive Condo Axis Brand New 2B 2B Exec 1101 flr Condo Views
posting_body: ['Executive Condo with Great View for rent.', 'Excellent Credit, No pets.', '<URL>, Plan B 11 the floor.', 'Please email for additional questions', 'Available August 31st', 'Cheers !!', 'PLEASE CALL', 'show contact info', 'Details:', '38 N Almaden Blvd.#1101, a gorgeous and modern 2 bedroom 2 bath condo with incredible high-rise views in the heart of Downtown San Jose.', 'This luxurious condo is located in the well-known Axis Building located downtown near transportation, parks, shopping and restaurants!', 'Well-known companies are also near-by, making it the ideal urban retreat in the heart of Silicon Valley!', 'You can literally walk to hotspots such as San Pedro Square and amazing restaurants from your chic San Jose pad.', 'The Lobby gives you a sense of refinery and even provides a concierge for all your needs!', 'A Lounge is located to the left, and gives swanky a whole new meaning!', 'Up the elevator, on the 11th floor, you will find your dream retreat, complete with large windows, modern amenities and bright natural light and breath-taking views!', 'The Living Room is open and luxurious, ideal for entertaining your next get together!', "You'll notice this home includes gleaming dark hardwood floors and recessed lighting throughout.", 'The views from the Living Room will provide guests with awe-inducing landscapes, and the lights at night are even more beautiful!', 'A fantastic Balcony opens up off of the Living Room, providing you a slice of the good life!', "You'll want to see the views from this Balcony to believe it!", 'On the far side of the Living Room, a Dining Area awaits your dinner party, and is in close proximity to the Kitchen for quick serving.', 'Throw a lavish dinner party for friends and be the talk of the town!', 'The modern and chic Kitchen comes with all the amenities, including stainless steel oven, refrigerator, dishwasher and microwave.', 'Also included are granite countertops and updated contemporary cabinetry.', 'From the Living Room are two large and bright Bedrooms both with ample closets!', "The Master Bedroom features an en-suite updated Bathroom with large mirrors and an amazing soaking tub that you'll want to relax in every night!", 'Also included are two closets on each side of the Bathroom Hallway.', 'Also featured is a main full Bath with Shower/Tub combo featuring updated Subway-Style Tile and newer Washer and Dryer, making chores a breeze!', '2 dedicated parking spots near the elevator, are included, along with a Fitness center, Deck with a pool, two hot tubs and large BBQ area!', 'This amazing retreat in Downtown San Jose is not to be missed!!', "Come and see why you'll want to make it yours!"]
